win32-exec.c.name: Win32 Direct Execution
win32-exec.c.description:
Basic shellcode execution in memory:
- VirtualAlloc for memory allocation
- memcpy to copy shellcode
- Direct execution

win32-exec-aes-encryption.c.name: Win32 Direct Execution Encrypted ShellCode
win32-exec-aes-encryption.c.description:
Basic execution of ecrypted shellcode in memory:
- KEY
- IV
- Decrypt function
- VirtualAlloc for memory allocation
- memcpy to copy shellcode
- Direct execution

win32-spawn-process-injection.c.name: Win32 Spawn Process Injection
win32-spawn-process-injection.c.description:
Process injection technique:
- Creates a suspended process
- Allocates memory in target
- Injects and executes shellcode

win32-spawn-process-injection-aes-encryp.name: Win32 Spawn Process Encrypted ShellCode Injection
win32-spawn-process-injection-aes-encryp.description:
Process injection technique:
- KEY
- IV 
- Decrypt function
- Creates a suspended process
- Allocates memory in target
- Injects and executes shellcode

win32-exec.cs.name: C# Win32 Direct Execution
win32-exec.cs.description:
C# shellcode execution:
- P/Invoke for Win32 API access
- VirtualAlloc for memory allocation
- Marshal.Copy for shellcode injection
- CreateThread for execution

ntdll-exec.cs.name: C# NTDLL Direct Execution
ntdll-exec.cs.description:
Alternative C# shellcode execution using NTDLL:
- Direct NTDLL function calls
- NtAllocateVirtualMemory for memory allocation
- NtCreateThreadEx for thread creation
- Manual function resolution

win32-exec.rs.name: Rust Win32 Direct Execution
win32-exec.rs.description:

- VirtualAlloc
